OctoPop is a juicy underwater twin-stick shooter where you play as a cute octopus named Octo.

After a chemical leak in Octo’s lagoon, the tiny octopus must defend against waves of soulless enemies. This won’t stop Octo’s passion for seashells though! Help Octo collect  the more you can.

How to Play:

Navigate to the Controls menu to select gamepad or mouse & keyboard input.

Collect seashells to increase your score. Only Octo’s head is vulnerable, don’t worry too much about your tentacles.

Development:

OctoPop is my first attempt at Unity and game development in general. No assets were used, I made everything from the sprites to the sound design.

OctoPop game mechanics are heavily inspired by Bizarre Creations’ Geometry Wars but in a totally different setting and with a bit of bullet hell to spice things up.

It’s a very early release and I’d like to continue working on this project, so please consider supporting through donation. Please report any bug you encounterand, also I’ll be glad to take any suggestion or critisicm you may have to improve the game.

Here’s the roadmap for future versions:
